title: Odd Numbers
concept: Print all odd numbers between a and b inclusive.
prompt: Print all odd numbers between a and b inclusive (space separated).

python.starter:
a,b=map(int,input().split())
res=[str(i) for i in range(a,b+1) if i%2!=0]
print(' '.join(res))

java.starter: import java.util.*;public class Main{public static void main(String[] args){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int a=sc.nextInt(),b=sc.nextInt();for(int i=a;i<=b;i++)if(i%2!=0)System.out.print(i+(i<b?" ":"\n"));}}
